meanings.definition: In a way that uses resources effectively and imaginatively.
meanings.sent1: She solved the puzzle resourcefully by using all the available tools.
meanings.sent2: The team worked resourcefully to complete the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel resourcefully gathered nuts for the winter in a tiny backpack.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted resourcefully, using everyday objects to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The explorer resourcefully navigated through the dense jungle using only a map and a compass.

meanings.definition: Showing the ability to find quick and clever ways to overcome difficulties.
meanings.sent1: The resourceful student quickly found a solution to the challenging math problem.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her resourceful nature when it comes to problem-solving.
meanings.sent3: The resourceful cat figured out how to open the door to get to its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The resourceful detective cracked the case using unconventional methods.
meanings.sent5: The resourceful inventor created a device that revolutionized the industry.
